channel.title: Npm on else{break}
channel.description: Recent content in Npm on else{break}

item.title: Issue with npm and 5$ DigitalOcean VPS
item.description: I had an issue with my docker ghost blog, it kept being killed for no reason… GET /robots.txt 200 16.540 ms - - GET / 200 160.595 ms - - Killed npm ERR! Linux 3.16.0-4-amd64 npm ERR! argv "node" "/usr/local/bin/npm" "start" npm ERR! node v0.10.40 npm ERR! npm v2.14.1 npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE So I tried to debug npm and found that it has an issue with low ram, so a solution is to increase the swap size.
